title: i want to get pbe id
body: hi im korean my korean game nickname is urf모드씹잼. it means urf mode rally fun. so want to play urfmode pls permit pbe id.

replies.body:
You can apply for PBE Access on [**this page.**](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) If you'd like to find more about the PBE system, please check our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) out. ^.^

Let me know if you have any questions.
